Tolkien-related events that took place in 1921.

content.title: February
content.content:
9 - Author Gisbert Kranz is born.
12 - Saul Zaentz, producer and movie rights holder of The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit, is born.

content.title: March
content.content: 16 - J.R.R. Tolkien is appointed to membership of the Faculty of Arts and the Board of the Faculty Arts at the University of Leeds.

? - Fourteenth Century Verse and Prose is published, but without Tolkien's A Middle English Vocabulary.
? - Author Alan Bliss is born.
Years
1918 1919 1920 1921 1922 1923 1924
